title: A. Michael West: Advancing human-robot interactions in health care
summary: A. Michael West, a mechanical engineering PhD candidate at MIT, discusses how he stumbled into his career path and the importance of mentorship and community. He credits the MIT Summer Research Program (MSRP) for giving him the confidence to pursue graduate school and succeed in academia. West's current research focuses on understanding human movement to develop better robotics for rehabilitation. He has received prestigious fellowships and is interested in the translational side of research. West emphasizes the importance of asking for help and learning from others in complex work.
